## TrackIdentifier type

The TrackIdentifier type is used to select Tracks either based on - Track.Source and/or name of the track, e.g. `{source: Track.Source.Camera}` or `{name: "my-track"}` - TrackReference (participant and publication)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type TrackIdentifier<T extends Track.Source = Track.Source> =
  | TrackSource<T>
  | TrackReference;
```

**References:** [TrackSource](./components-core.tracksource.md)<!-- -->, [TrackReference](./components-core.trackreference.md)
